name: sacco-monorepo
description: Sacco - A comprehensive web application with Chrome extension, React frontend, and backend API

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:extension" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:extension && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.precommit:frontend: npm run type-check --workspace=react-frontend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=react-frontend && npm run test:run --workspace=react-frontend && npm run build --workspace=react-frontend

author: Sacco Team
